prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a small green plant with cute, rounded leaves.
Show me a Pokemon with a soft pink body and green leafy accents, perfect for a forest setting.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that has a playful personality, blending seamlessly into its lush surroundings.
Design a Pokemon with vibrant green features and a charming appearance to attract trainers.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it could be found in a sunny meadow filled with flowers.
Generate a creature that embodies nature, with delicate details and an inviting color palette.
Make a Pokemon that is small, cute, and has a refreshing design inspired by young plants.
